scripts.build:electron-main: tsc electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts --outDir dist --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.prebuild: pnpm --filter github build && pnpm --filter github-remote build && pnpm --filter change-engine build && pnpm --filter mapping-remote build && pnpm --filter repo-analyzer build && pnpm --filter agent-v5 build && npm run copy-packages
scripts.copy-packages: mkdir -p packages && cp -r ../../packages/github/dist packages/github && cp -r ../../packages/github-remote/dist packages/github-remote && cp -r ../../packages/change-engine/dist packages/change-engine && cp -r ../../packages/mapping-remote/dist packages/mapping-remote && cp -r ../../packages/repo-analyzer/dist packages/repo-analyzer && cp -r ../../packages/agent-v5/dist packages/agent-v5 && echo '✅ Packages copied to apps/desktop/packages'
scripts.copy-overlay-scripts: mkdir -p dist/overlay && cp ../../packages/overlay/src/preload/browser-interaction.js dist/overlay/ && cp ../../packages/overlay/src/preload/multiplayer-cursors.js dist/overlay/ && echo '✅ Overlay scripts copied to dist/overlay'
scripts.build: npm run build:electron-main && npm run copy-overlay-scripts && vite build && electron-builder
